description:

Leg Opening: 19.75" - 24.25"

name: Badge Bomb Bundles!!
description:
WAS FOUR BADGES FOR £2.50 NOW £1.50
WAS SIX BADGES FOR £3.50 NOW £2.50

Four Badges for £2.50 (saving 50p)
Six Badges for £3.50 (saving £1)

You can either buy 4 of your choosing or if you can't decide and love them all, go for Pick N Mix and see what you get!
You can choose from ANY of the badges available!!

If you're after a personalised bundle, once your order has been placed please email me with either the item number or description of each badges!

name: Forest Box By Gama-Go Part One
description:
One Inch Round Buttons from Badge Bomb!
Designed by Gama-Go

Badge Bomb collaborates with select artists and brands around the globe to bring you buttons we believe in. 

WAS 75p
NOW 50p

You can buy single badges for a bargain 75p OR 4 for £2.50!

Only a few in each style so get yours quick before they sell out!!
